players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among us three remaining players."
You: "Bob seems eager to lead the discussion. Diana, do you have any thoughts on what happened?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
You: "Bob, do you have anything to say about Diana's accusation?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
